alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 4:40PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cache and eastern Box Elder Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 440 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Corinne, or near Brigham City, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brigham City, Bear River City, Corinne, Honeyville, Elwood, Deweyville and Bear River. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 364 and 375. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
